title: Agricultural Market Structure and Strategy
description: Development of skills for quantity and price determination in a noncompetitive setting. Emphasis on examining the agribusiness industry structures that exist and their effects on decision-making. The use of game theory demonstrated as a strategy formulation tool. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: AGB 301; AGB 310; AGB 312; AGB 313; AGB 323; and one of the following AGB 327, AGB 328, AGB 405, AGB 421, AGB 422, AGB 433, AGB 435
